Title: Sendout capacity at France's Dunkerque LNG terminal to drop again amid new strike
Description: Sendout capacity will drop again at France's largest LNG import terminal in Dunkerque on Mar. 28 amid new strike action. The country's three other terminals are set to end a three-week strike on Mar. 28 although further strike extensions remain possible.
Author: DE

Title: UPDATE: Argentina’s Enarsa seeks one LNG cargo for Escobar, four cargoes for Bahia Blanca in May
Description: (Updates the story in the second paragraph with delivery windows for Bahia Blanca and Escobar.) Argentina’s state-owned energy firm Enarsa has issued a tender to buy cargoes for delivery in May to the country’s 6.62 mtpa Bahia Blanca and 6.1 mtpa Escobar LNG receiving terminals. The tender closes on Mar. 29.
Author: CK
